# Study Monitoring, Auditing, and Inspecting

## Auditing and Inspecting

::: {.instr_box}

By submitting this study for review, you agree to the following
statement -- DO NOT ALTER OR DELETE:

*The investigator will permit study-related monitoring, audits, and inspections by the Penn State quality assurance program office(s), IRB, the sponsor, and government regulatory bodies, of all study related documents (e.g., source documents, regulatory documents, data collection instruments, study data etc.).*
